entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:36 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:36 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:36 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
